tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: The BEST prof I\'ve had for a studio course. Very knowledgeable, gives great feedback, and makes you work hard! Generates important discussions during class, invites interesting artists to present their work for students, shows great samples of video art. Adds great workshops: montage theory, distribution, light. Other profs loose in comparison.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GET READY TO READ
comments: Nelson is a good teacher who can appear a little bit shy and not talkative but you will see after few classes that he is quite funny and relaxed. He is very open on every subject and is very accessible. I liked to study in his class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Sure, if you are interested in video art you will have fun with the projects. However Nelson lacks the fundamental qualities a teacher should have, he clearly does not enjoy vomiting up the same thing he has been teaching for years, you can tell by his half closed eyes and meandering lazy voice.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: At times he did seem lazy in arousing class discussion, or even provided little to no references when needed. On his good days however, he was very critical and constructive and served as good guidance. He can be harsh at times but that\'s only if you\'re too sensitive. He\'s a great teacher to have especially because he still practices.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: His ability to grade always changed from video to video, but his comments/feedback remained the same. Sometimes it appeared like he didn\'t want to teach, or he was being lazy. Writing assignments were even worse & useless. To put it: mediocre.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Doesn\'t appear to enjoy teaching, little technical ability, hours of watching a very small range of video art which is hardly discussed.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He has charisma but sense of humor~ I loved the class! he is a bit harsh on your summaries, but you will learn many things from the exercise! he is definitely intellectual!!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Versatile teacher, knowledgeable about his craft. Helpful and challenging for young video artists. Gave me the best feedback. Funny and totally hot.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: OH EM GEE LOVED THE CLASS SO FUNNY
